game_description: Swing around using your Web-Shooters in VR! Swing around with your friends, find secrets & play minigames! With a pull of the trigger you'll shoot a fully-physics-based web that you can swing around on. Using a full physics body you'll be able to climb around, hold onto other players, and truly feel immersed in the world of Web-Guy!
review_1: OK so I've been looking for a game like this for a while now, and when I found this game I thought my search would be over, however the servers were either full or I would get an error message every.single.time I booted up the game, so I was stuck swinging around the starter room for about 5 minutes before leaving. Devs if your hearing this, please make a single player mode or allow us to create our own private servers. I'd love to play this game and I really hope my issue can be fixed, and I promise you if this issue gets solved for good I'll make this review 5 stars and thank you lots. Devs I hope you can solve this, may your game thrive!
